CustomField.description: If the Cost Type of this quote line is CAPEX - New Build or CAPEX - Refurb, Calculates the total amount of CAPEX (Unit Cost * Quantity) for this Quote Line.
CustomField.formula: SBQQ__Quantity__c * CASE( Cost_Type__c , "CAPEX - New Build", SBQQ__UnitCost__c, "CAPEX - Refurb", SBQQ__UnitCost__c, NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Cost Type of this quote line is CAPEX - New Build or CAPEX - Refurb, Calculates the total amount of CAPEX (Unit Cost * Quantity) for this Quote Line.
CustomField.label: CAPEX Total
